wikipedia_page.main: Susie Mathis (born Susan Mathis,  29 April 1947) is a former singer, actress and radio presenter who, in later years, became a fundraiser for Francis House Children's Hospice, and many other  charities in North West England.

response: *Susie Mathis (born 1947), British pop singer and radio presenter
